title: Michael Flynn
deleted: {{Short description|U.S. Army general and former U.S. National Security Advisor}}Note: any Trump supporter will be called a conspiracy theorist on Wikipedia. They get their sources from a far left media report as their credit source. Therefore a law suit will soon take place against fake news media agencies, big social networks and now Wikipedia.

title: Michael Flynn
added: On July 4, 2020, Flynn pledged an oath to the pro-Trump [[QAnon]] conspiracy theory,<ref name="auto2">{{Cite web|url=https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2020/07/to-celebrate-the-fourth-michael-flynn-posts-a-pledge-to-conspiracy-group-qanon/|title=To celebrate the Fourth, Michael Flynn posts a pledge to conspiracy group QAnon.|first=Jackie Flynn|last=Mogensen}}</ref><ref name="Marshall Cohen">{{Cite web|url=https://www.cnn.com/2020/07/07/politics/michael-flynn-qanon-video/index.html|title=Michael Flynn posts video featuring QAnon slogans|first=Marshall|last=Cohen|website=CNN}}</ref><ref name="Sommer">{{Cite web|url=https://www.thedailybeast.com/michael-flynn-goes-full-qanon-in-his-post-pardon-media-tour|title=Michael Flynn Goes Full QAnon in His Post-Pardon Media Tour|first=Will|last=Sommer|date=December 7, 2020|via=www.thedailybeast.com}}</ref> and as [[Attempts to overturn the 2020 United States presidential election|Trump sought to overturn the results]] of the 2020 presidential election in which he was defeated, Flynn suggested the president should [[Martial law in the United States|suspend the Constitution]], silence the press and hold a new election under military authority.<ref>Multiple sources:

* {{Cite web|url=https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/us-election-2020/michael-flynn-suspend-constitution-martial-law-trump-reelection-b1765467.html|title=Michael Flynn calls for Trump to suspend the constitution and declare martial law to re-run election|date=December 3, 2020|website=The Independent|access-date=December 4, 2020|archive-date=December 8, 2020|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20201208201019/https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/us-election-2020/michael-flynn-suspend-constitution-martial-law-trump-reelection-b1765467.html|url-status=live}}
